body_html:
Hi,
I agree that git submodule fails for different projects, but I am not sure how to test if it works correctly. Excuse me if I ask some very basic questions but all this is very new to me. Hopefully what I did tested whether or not git-submodule is broken. I found a script or shell command for git-submodule in
C:\Program Files\Git\mingw64\libexec\git-core
I can open it on notepad++ -> git-submodule.sh

When I write in command line git submodule init, nothing happens. After a second or so, it returns to the prompt

C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build>git --version
git version 2.12.2.windows.2
C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build>git submodule init

C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build>git submodule summary

C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\zlib>git --help submodule
(--This one send me to file:///C:/Program%20Files/Git/mingw64/share/doc/git-doc/git-submodule.html )

C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\zlib\src\zlib>git status
HEAD detached at 5089329
nothing to commit, working tree clean
C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\zlib\src\zlib>git submodule init

C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\zlib\src\zlib>git submodule summary

C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\zlib\src\zlib>

I'm not sure what else I could do. I searched online and did not find a good solution or at least one that I could implement.
Thanks.

body:
Hi,
  I agree that git submodule fails for different projects, but I am not sure how to test if it works correctly. Excuse me if I ask some very basic questions but all this is very new to me. Hopefully what I did tested whether or not git-submodule is broken. I found a script or shell command for git-submodule in 
C:\Program Files\Git\mingw64\libexec\git-core
I can open it on notepad++ -> git-submodule.sh

When I write in command line git submodule init, nothing happens. After a second or so, it returns to the prompt

C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build>git --version
git version 2.12.2.windows.2
C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build>git submodule init

C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build>git submodule summary

C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\zlib>git --help submodule
(--This one send me to file:///C:/Program%20Files/Git/mingw64/share/doc/git-doc/git-submodule.html )

C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\zlib\src\zlib>git status
HEAD detached at 5089329
nothing to commit, working tree clean
C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\zlib\src\zlib>git submodule init

C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\zlib\src\zlib>git submodule summary

C:\Projects\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\zlib\src\zlib>

I'm not sure what else I could do. I searched online and did not find a good solution or at least one that I could implement.
Thanks.
